metadata.title: CVE-2015-2156 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Netty before 3.9.8.Final, 3.10.x before 3.10.3.Final, 4.0.x before4.0.28.Final, and 4.1.x before 4.1.0.Beta5 and Play Framework 2.x before2.3.9 might allow remote attackers to bypass the httpOnly flag on cookiesand obtain sensitive information by leveraging improper validation ofcookie name and value characters.

criterions.comment: netty3.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
netty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
